extends Truck

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCar(Car car)
      Adds a car to the transporter if it is not full
      int getMaxSize()
      Get the max number of cars that can be stored in the car transport
      void lowerFlatbed()
      If car is not moving, lowers the flatbed to where it is closed, returns flatbed state
      void move()
      Increases/decreases the x- and y-position according to the current speed and rotation, unless it is hindered.
      void raiseFlatbed()
      If car is not moving, raises the flatbed to where it is open, returns flatbed state
      Car removeCar()
      Removes the Last car from the transporter

    • Method Detail

      • addCar

        public void addCar(Car car)
        Adds a car to the transporter if it is not full
        Parameters:
        car - the car to be added to the flatbed

      • removeCar

        public Car removeCar()
        Removes the Last car from the transporter
        Returns:
        the car that was removed, throws NullPointerException if flatbed is closed

      • getMaxSize

        public int getMaxSize()
        Get the max number of cars that can be stored in the car transport
        Returns:
        the max number of cars

      • raiseFlatbed

        public void raiseFlatbed()
        If car is not moving, raises the flatbed to where it is open, returns flatbed state

      • lowerFlatbed

        public void lowerFlatbed()
        If car is not moving, lowers the flatbed to where it is closed, returns flatbed state

      • move

        public void move()
        Increases/decreases the x- and y-position according to the current speed and rotation, unless it is hindered. Furthermore, a raised flatbed will hinder the Truck from moving. Also updates positions of all carStorage on the transporter
        Specified by:
        move in interface IMovable
        Overrides:
        move in class Truck
